title: Far.Cry.4.Valley.of.the.Yeti.Addon-RELOADED

                  Far Cry 4 Valley of the Yeti ADDON (c) Ubisoft 

        03/2015 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: UbiDRM + Ubisoft
              1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: FPS, Adventure 

  This add on includes: 

  "Valley of the Yeti" and "Overrun" and updates the game to v1.9.0 

  No changelog yet from Ubisoft. 

  1. Unrar.
  2. Burn or mount the image.
  3. Install the game.
  4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
     your game install directory.
  5. Play the game.
  6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT! 

  NOTES: Only Far.Cry.4.Proper-RELOADED is needed to be installed.
         No other release
